name: Ealdorlight: 3D rogue-like combat demo
description:
Ealdorlight aimed to be a new kind of RPG which merges procedural generation of history, a realistic damage model and "step-based" Roguelike combat. It combined elements of Mount and Blade and Dwarf Fortress: Adventure mode gameplay with a compelling story that guides and gives focus to the player.

The Kickstarter sadly wasn't successful, and the project is on indefinite hold. The combat demo is available so you can try out some of these experimental 3D rogue-like ideas yourself.

If you like it, please leave a comment!You can also grab Sol Trader, a procedural 3d space game I released on Steam and Itch.io in 2016.

Visit the Ealdorlight Kickstarter page
